QUERY_CLOB:
with std as (
    select case when months_between (sysdate, apv.last_updated_on) > svt_preferences.get_preference ('AST_CLEANUP_DELAY')
                then case when apv.condition_type = 'Never'
                          then 'NEVERPAGEVAL'
                          end
                end child_code,
           apv.condition_type,
           apv.application_id,
           apv.page_id,
           apv.region_id,
           apv.region_name,
           apv.validation_name element_name,
           apv.last_updated_by,
           apv.last_updated_on,
           apv.build_option,
	         apv.workspace,
	         apv.validation_id component_id
    from apex_application_page_val apv
	  where apv.workspace = svt_preferences.get_preference ('SVT_DEFAULT_WORKSPACE')
)
select case when std.child_code is null 
            then 'Y'
            else 'N'
            end pass_yn,
       std.application_id,
       std.page_id,
       null created_by,
       null created_on,
       std.last_updated_by,
       std.last_updated_on,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) should be made available or deleted. It has been unavailable since `%4`',
                          p0 => 'Validation with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`',
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end validation_failure_message,
       case when std.child_code is not null 
            then apex_string.format('%0 (page %1, app %2) has been unavailable for too long',
                          p0 => 'Validation with Never condition `'||std.element_name||'`',
                          p1 => std.page_id,
                          p2 => std.application_id,
                          p4 => to_char(std.last_updated_on, 'DD-MON-YY')
                        ) 
            end issue_title,
	   std.child_code,
     std.element_name,
		 std.component_id,
		 null parent_component_id,
		 std.workspace
from std
EXPLANATION: Region Operations and features (Validations, procedures, charts, card actions, map layers, search sources) should be available or deleted : \* Charts that have had their Server-Side Condition set to "Never" (for whatever reason), should be removed. Including these items/regions just creates unnecessary app bloat.
